about:
I am Yuki from Canada having 8+ years of experience with web & blockchain and game & software developments.


 I like team spirit Sports, especially Volleyball, Football, and Basketball.
 I always put credit first on my assignments and strive to become a world-class developer, and it is my dream to become the best developer.
 There is a principle I found while developing the program.
 ➢ Respect clients and follow their wishes.
 ➢ Until you value yourself, you won't value your time. Until you value your time, you will not do anything with it.
 ➢ Pixel perfect, structured, and optimized design, smart and clean coding.
 I always work with this principle and strive to upload this principle.
